servinfo.title: Precautions in Speedometer Test or Other Tests
servinfo.ptxt: When performing speedometer or other tests using speedometer tester or chassis dynamometer, ESP® function must be deactivated by using SUZUKI scan tool (not by ESP® OFF switch) to complete the tests correctly. ESP® OFF switch turns ESP® function off temporarily and ESP® function recovers and activates at 30 km/h (18.5 mph) or more. Refer to SUZUKI scan tool operator's manual for further details.
